text: Ferdinand III (baptised as Ferdinand Ernest; 13 July 1608 in Graz â€“ 2 April 1657 in Vienna) was Archduke of Austria from 1621, King of Hungary from 1625, King of Croatia and Bohemia from 1627 and Holy Roman Emperor from 1637 to 1657. == Biography == === Early life === Ferdinand was born in Graz and grew up in Carinthia, he is the third son of Emperor Ferdinand II of Habsburg. He received education and training from the Jesuits. After the deaths of his brothers Karl (1603) and Johann Karl (1619), he became the successor of his father. == References == Category:1608 births Category:1657 deaths Category:Holy Roman Emperors Category:17th century in Germany
title: Ferdinand III of Habsburg
